website_summaries.verdict: A fun and practical Sesame Street themed toddler desk that makes youngsters excited to have their own spot for playing, sitting, learning, and more.
pros: Generates praise for its sturdy build that can accommodate kids up to about 50 pounds
Desktop with cup holder and seat with pull-out storage compartment make it perfect for numerous types of play as well as keeping other small toys organized
cons: Assembly is challenging, and a few parents had to purchase additional hardware
Occasional quality control issues, so check over everything upon delivery

customer_reviews.title: Cute chair, TERRIBLE chemical smell
customer_reviews.text: This chair is cute and perfect size for a 2-3 year old. The table top doesn’t seem very sturdy and may break over time. The hole for a cup seems too big. When you inbox the chair, the chemical smell is TERRIBLE! It gave me an awful headache. I had to put it in another room to air out. We have had it for a week and it still smells awful. I hope the smell will eventually fade. I’m shocked it is legal to use paint/varnish with such a toxic smell on a product for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: The Elmo Desk
customer_reviews.text: Building this took maybe 30 mins and that was with my little helper “helping”. I ended up with one of everything as far as hardware, which comes in handy if you’re a first time builder and screw up locking the screws in place. I used one flat, one Phillips and a smaller Phillips as I had to get the screwdriver into a tight fit. Our little one is about a year and a half so smaller than the age group it’s for, so she has a little bit of trouble getting off as her feet don’t touch the ground, but she loves her desk since it’s next to mommy who is working from home.
customer_reviews.author: Moises Garcia Landeros

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and great quality chair
customer_reviews.text: We got our son this chair for Christmas because he loves Sesame Street and loves numbers. He absolutely loves it!! It was very easy to assemble and it has proven to be a great spot for him to do arts and crafts, play with toys, and eat snacks. The surfaces are also very easy to clean! Overall we feel it was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: WeLoveOllie

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, cute, but assembly is definitely a 2 person thing.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice perfect for “home school “ of my two little ones, great size, fits nice in a corner, it was actually really better quality than I expected....the only thing was putting it together.....u need two ppl, and omgggg atleast 30-45 mins, but overall great deal, could’ve been a bit cheaper, but still worth it . Very very cute , I think I might have to get another one, my kids are fighting over it lol
customer_reviews.author: Michelle S

customer_reviews.title: Possible lead paint! No safe and arrives damaged
customer_reviews.text: Not safe! Arrived damaged. I Decided to put it together anyway, as I was the paint literally chipped off into thousand of tiny pieces anytime my fingers or hands touched any part of the product. The paint chipped away into thousands of sharp like pieces. Not safe for children to relax, eat or craft on! I suspect it may be lead paint. I use to swear by delta for kids furniture and accessories. After this purchase I will definitely look into reviews before ordering from this company ever again. Highly disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Haechans Bop

customer_reviews.title: We use the chair every day
customer_reviews.text: My two year old granddaughter really likes her chair. She can play independently and feel safe when she is using her table. In the past she has fallen when trying to use the big table and chairs. She gets a sense of success when using the drawer under the chair to find her writing and coloring supplies. The cup holder is used for beverages as well as a cup to hold crayons. So versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute desk, but has flaws
customer_reviews.text: My husband assembled this desk and he did say the directions are not clear and accurate, but he was still able to get it together in less than 30 minutes. It also has an extremely strong chemical smell. Thankfully, we bought months in advance, so it has aired out sitting in our garage. The top of the desk came with a crack in it, but not worth the hassle of a return. I loveeee the look and the cup holder, and the size, though.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: They love it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My great nephew I gifted this to was thrilled as was his little brother. What a sharing lesson this gift created, cute to see them both sitting in it together trying their bests to be the only one in it. The family has requested the brother getting one for his up coming birthday, so be it the next one will be on it’s way next month. Oh yes the kittens love sleeping under the chair in the compartment and sometimes it even works as their hiding spot from the boys.
customer_reviews.author: Huck

customer_reviews.title: Works great for toddlers.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my one year old to sit and eat snacks at. It's been working out great! It was easy for me to put together and didn't take long at all. Unfortunately my son likes to try and dance on it, but it's thankfully sturdy. The colors are great and doesn't look cheap. It's been good practice for learning to sit at a table. I haven't used the storage bin since I know he'll just destroy it at this age, so I do wish it came with a plastic one instead.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: came with missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Did not retur ,do not like to deal with the hassle of returns. Especially waiting so long for product, my teenager put the chair/desk together for my baby. Disapointed we never got the full benefit out of chair/desk. My child does utilize it when sitting in living room, however we never got to use it for a desk. Purchased Sesame Street themed chair, cute idea.
customer_reviews.author: buyer

customer_reviews.title: Two Year Old Approved
customer_reviews.text: Since right now Sesame Street and particularly Elmo and Cookie Monster are at the top of my granddaughter's HAPPY list, we purchased the chair. My husband, who is not the handy man, put the chair together in about 30 minutes. All the parts were there and directions were easy to follow. The chair comes with a little cloth bin under the seat which my granddaughter likes putting small toys into for safe keeping. Love that the numbers 1-20 are printed on the top.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy enough for an overly active kid
customer_reviews.text: The table just was not sturdy enough for my 2.5 year old. The desk top was destined to break. I really liked the design but it's not meant for a kid that is active and not going to sit in it nicely. I rarely return items but this desk also had 2 splintered pieces of wood and the cup was missing. If they made it more sturdy this would be a 5/5.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and adorable product...all hardware included
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my grandson, for January. I have already assembled to make sure that the hardware was all there due to the comments about missing hardware. It went together easily and seems sturdy. Time will tell on how it will hold up to toddler wear and tear. It really is adorable and I expect great things from this product.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Ok chair with bad design
customer_reviews.text: The chair is nice, my son likes it but I’m not happy with the assembly materials. A lot of screws are set with a circular piece of metal that holds it in when you screw it (don’t know the name). The problem is these parts fall off through wear and tear and vibrations. I’ve had to screw them back in like 4 times in a month. They are round and the size of a marble so a bad thing to be falling out in front of a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: J-Knight

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This chair is exactly what it claims to be. It came on time in an undamaged box and with all parts needed, plus a couple extra screws. The diagrams were easy to follow and required no reading. You do not need power tools to assemble. It looks exactly like the picture when assembled and is very sturdy. My son just turned 4 and is thin, but tall. It is perfect for him. He loves the little bin underneath for toys and is proud to have his own "big boy chair" in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Muse's Epiphany

customer_reviews.title: can be used for a few years
customer_reviews.text: easy to assemble, easy to clean, can be used from age 1y 6 m and up. or even earlier. It is still in good condition except for the surface which is in stickers and scratches after baby use:-). which I consider expected wear and tear. I am having it for a few months and happy with it. the quality of the table for this price met my expectation.:-)
customer_reviews.author: Galochka

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and useful desk.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute desk, it has held up well. Bought when my daughter was about 16months. she is 18months now. She sits and does coloring on this desk. It is easy to put together, I had no problems (accept wrestling with my toddler while doing it). The cup holder is removable but fits even wide sippy cups. The drawer slides all the way in and out the back which does get annoying sometimes. It's a nice place to keep crayons, paper, and coloring books though. I think we will have it for along time and get some good use out of it. She loves seeing elmo on the side!
customer_reviews.author: MissDion

customer_reviews.title: So much to love about it!
customer_reviews.text: Quality of this desk is incredible- especially for the price! I put it together myself in no time at all. I know others had trouble with the cup arriving damaged, but ours was perfectly fine. And good thing- because my daughter is obsessed with it! We gave it to her at 9 months, and although she mostly uses it to stand and play around, she does sit in it occasionally and it is definitely her favorite “toy”. She also loves the drawer underneath for packing and unpacking all of her toys. We’ve had it for about six weeks now, and despite daily abuse, it is holding up wonderfully. Oh- and the design is great as well!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my Grandson when he was about 18 months old, he is now a little over 2 and he continues to sit, eat and play in and on this Elmo table. I think if I got rid of it, he would explode. He can write, draw, paint, eat and even spill on it and it's made so I can sanitize it almost without any effort at all. I think the only problem will be that one day soon, he's going to try to go sit and will find that he's to big and can't get into it any more.
customer_reviews.author: Gail. W

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is a real piece of furniture. It’s nice sturdy wood. By daughter got it as a gift for her first bday and love it. She’s almost two now uses it everyday still. Easy to clean. She’s pretty rough with it and it’s holding up well. We had to get past her wanting to stand on it but that’s with anything and toddlers 🤷🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: allison

customer_reviews.title: Leg came broken/cracked
customer_reviews.text: The leg came broken, which is a shame because it’s pretty noticeable and looks with any kind of extra weight it might completely break that little part off. Shipping/Return isn’t an option for me, it will be so expensive because I use a shipping forwarder as I am located in the Caribbean. Ordered as a gift for my son and decided to put together to save time on Christmas Day I’ve attached photos. And no noticeable damage to the box.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara H.

customer_reviews.title: So cute.
customer_reviews.text: My 15 month old loves this desk, we got the sesame street one. Vibrant colors, super cute. Only complaint is an exposed screw on the top of the desk. She can't get hurt by it, its screwed in, but she keeps wanting to touch it. Guess she'll just get used to it. Surprised there's not a plastic covering for that screw head though. Then would be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Atticus

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk
customer_reviews.text: My brother in law bought one for his kid and couldn't get it together. So if you've never held a screwdriver before and spent your whole life in school you may have to have your wife assemble it for you. If you've ever turned a wrench it should be a breeze. It is a sturdy item for press board. It has a high quality finish. It looks nice. My kids like it. It is worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Cute- not the easiest assembly
customer_reviews.text: Love the chair but the instructions are terrible. Luckily I found a YouTube video that was way more informative bc I almost threw it out the window. Has a strong scent but I Lysol the whole chair downs. I did notice 2 tiny scuffs in the wood but it’s fine. My toddler will get a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Mercedes

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the easy assembly instructions you'll have no problem at all putting this together. If I can do it, it must be relatively simple. It is SUPER sturdy. My granddaughter couldn't stop looking at the great graphics. High polish makes it easy to clean too.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Wrong manual and missing cup, but great desk!
customer_reviews.text: The manual that came with the product is the incorrect product. If you get it and it asks for part K, don’t be alarmed it does not go with this model. You will see how part A does not quite look like the diagram. My desk was missing the pencil cup. Overall my 19 month old loves it!!!! I put one of his tumblers in the holder for his snack. Although his feet don’t touch the floor, he has no trouble getting in and out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Hot Mama

customer_reviews.title: Great choice for kids furniture
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something my toddler could play and eat at and this is just right. I thought I was to big at first but she tried to get in it immediately. She loves the pictures. It has a cup and a hole for the cup so I put snacks in it. As she gets older I'm sure we can put pins in it. The only thing I dont like is it doesnt have handles or anything to move it around.
customer_reviews.author: L review

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My 21 months old daughter loves it! She hopped in her new desk seat before it was completely put together :) she knew it was for her I guess! She loves to sit in it and color and play with her toys. She stood on the seat a few times but it's stable. It was easy to put it together, all holes line up perfectly. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kei-san

customer_reviews.title: We LOVED this little desk.
customer_reviews.text: It was absolutely perfect for a 2 and 3 year old. She colored, played, ate, opened presents there. The desk is very well made, not wobbly at all, very easy to clean, and relatively easy to assemble. She would stand on the seat, as toddlers do, and it didn't make me worry. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: TroJanClan

customer_reviews.title: Nice design, generally sturdy, except the arm comes loose.
customer_reviews.text: Despite some flaws, my little one really likes his table. We don't really use the cup. A larger hole with a removable cup holder (so it can be cleaned easier) would have been a better option. Pros: Easy to clean. Seems sturdy other than the table that loosens up.Nice design. Cons: It keeps coming loose. I'm afraid of over-tightening and breaking some of the hardware. The cloth drawer doesn't have anything to stop it from coming out the back.
customer_reviews.author: PC Geek

customer_reviews.title: Great find! We love it!
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old son loves this Sesame Street desk! I was going to keep it at Grandma's so he has a place to eat and draw. He loves it so much that we are getting a second one for Grandma's and keeping this one. For the price why not he can have Mickey at Grandma's. He now prefers to eat all his meals and snacks at it. I let him unless it is a very messy food. He thinks it is the best every morning he wakes up he goes straight to it and sits there waiting for his breakfast. Should fit him for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased this chair for my nephew for his birthday. He absolutely loves it and it’s come in handy on multiple occasions. It was easy to put together easy to move and easy to use. I believe he will get a lot of use out of this chair
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Elmo chair for my 19m baby girl. She loved it. Her little feet don’t quite reach the floor lol but we both couldn’t be any happier. Great buy. Very sturdy and I (mom) had no problems putting it together, which took about 20m.
customer_reviews.author: Yadi

customer_reviews.title: It's nice and my tall three year old fits in it ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was fast. Took me about 30 minutes to put together. It's nice and my tall three year old fits in it nicely. The top part with the cup holder seems like it could break if too much weight is put on it, like a child leaning or climbing on it repeatedly. It also had a pretty big scratch on that part as well. Not a big deal to me, as my kids will most likely put some scratches on it in time as well. It's a good little desk for the price and my kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Sesame Street desk chair And Snufflepecus !!.
customer_reviews.text: I'm waiting to see how my granddaughter likes it... Me personally.... I love it !! ❤ the chairs put together in 2 hours. Count Bert Ernie and Snufflepecus !! We're watching out for Abby and Big Bird . Elmo Cookie and Groover to arrive soon..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Timely assemble. Check for damage. Easy to clean. Durable
customer_reviews.text: First time I purchased there were 6 damaged scratches making me consider this to be easy to scruff and mark. I returned and ordered a second time. There was no damage. Super cute and fun with a great price. Heavy well constructed. Took about 40 mins start to finish to put together. Great price, pain to put together. Check for damage before you start to put it together. Cleans well. No scratches yet. My two year old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My son was super into Elmo and this was a great gift. It is easy enough to assemble and is very sturdy. I love that it has a drawer at the bottom to place extra toys. It is nice and will last for a while.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my 2year old
customer_reviews.text: Not too difficult to put together and has held up so far. Perfect size for my 2year old! He loves the numbers on the desk and the storage is perfect for paper and crayons. My one and only concern is that when he sits in it and tries to slide across the floor, he about tipped it over. I would recommend having the back against something as opposed to free-standing.
customer_reviews.author: katlee421

customer_reviews.title: Your toddler needs one!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my (almost) 2 year old so she’d have a desk like her sisters when school starts. She’s huge on Sesame Street, and was so pumped after I put it together. The only flaw I see is with the drawer-there’s nothing stopping it from just sliding out of the back. That being said, having a toddler means stuff will get rearranged even if the drawer stayed in tact. 🤷‍♀️ Overall, LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Goehlfam

customer_reviews.title: Love this little desk
customer_reviews.text: Love this little desk, my daughter loves it too. Easy to assemble, great quality, easy to clean, perfect size for toddler, beautiful colors and design. Took away 1 star for the little drawer, its pretty flimsy & there should be a stopper in back, it just kind of slides through from front to back as my little one is using desk
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for toddler
customer_reviews.text: Love this little desk! It took us a bit to assemble, but I think that is more user error than the directions. It is perfect for our 18 month old. My only complaint is that the top of the desk has a screw spot that is hard to clean. It catches crumbs and things, but does not change my mind in how great it is overall. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Correll

customer_reviews.title: Worst desk
customer_reviews.text: If I could rate this zero stars I would!! It isn't sturdy at all. My kids are not rough on their things and this broke in only a few weeks. You should be able to sit at the desk and color without the table flipping up all the time. I even tried gorilla gluing the table and it didn't work. The thing that lasted was the chair the table broke so fast. I was so sad because my children love Sesame Street. I will not be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Has held up with my rough toddler pretty well the last 2 months. The instructions were difficult to follow and I ended up mostly winging it, thankfully I’m good at putting things together or I definitely would’ve struggled more than I did. It’s a super cute desk and my toddler enjoys it!
customer_reviews.author: Bri Estes

customer_reviews.title: Directions? Paint chipped!!
customer_reviews.text: So I got this for my two-year-old nephew for his birthday. I opened it to get it put together before his party and realize there was no directions. There is also multiple scratches and paint chips on the wood and material. I still have not been able to put it together before his birthday this weekend but I'm hoping I can find something online that can help me put it together. Buyers beware to be prepared to try and put this together by picture. It looks like a cute desk but I would not be purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa tabor

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy and Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter is yr and half and she has really been using this more and more as she gets older. It’s sturdy and heavy so it’s not going to move or flip. She eats a snack sitting down or plays with toys. I’d definelty but again.
customer_reviews.author: Karma California

customer_reviews.title: 3yo loves it cute and easy to wipe down
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We are doing homeschool for my 3yo and he fits in it perfectly. All pieces were there perfect shape. 3yo immediately sat and started counting the numbers on the table. He is looking forward to using it. One thing the table is not super big so depending on activity you might need to find something else. Other than that we love it!
customer_reviews.author: Thea

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Took me a good 30 minutes since it was my second on to assamble but it feels very good and study and looks like it would be easy to clean with no problem i love it and will be keeping it for a good while
customer_reviews.author: Bibiana Zacarias

customer_reviews.title: Not Consumer Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Although this is a cute product, you can rest assured that if a piece is defective or cracks while putting it together, this furniture company will not replace any pieces. You literally have to send them the whole thing back so they can give you a whole new one. A real inconvenience since all they have to do is replace a piece. Not consumer friendly at all.
customer_reviews.author: MargieP

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for little kids.
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair for my granddaughter. Top is a little slippery, matte might have been better then athe Hugh gloss. Colors are vibrant and pictures appropriate. Drawer on bottom can fall out the back, there is no stopper. Still great though. Assembly took about 15 minutes. Seems sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: S. E. Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: My son is in love with this desk! It’s very sturdy so far and the quality is great. It’s perfect for snacking, coloring, playtime etc. The storage on the bottom is handy to have too. I would recommend assembling with 2 persons if possible just cause it makes it a little easier. I’d purchase it again for friends or family members!
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: The parts had big scratches on them and didn't even line up right. I returned it. Very disappointing, because I'd been hoping my toddler would use it for arts and crafts.
customer_reviews.author: LollyDa

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair but the paint is chipping away.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter and after only a couple days, the painted surface began to chip in various places. I even had a piece flake off while I was cleaning it with a wet wipe. It originally looked great but the quality of the table top and painted surfaces do not seem like they will hold up in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: emess

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great buy, I have own the chair for almost a year, is super sturdy and my son loves it. I got it when he turn one and he has loved it since day one, now he is almost two and climbs on the desk part all the time and it doesn't flip, he is 30lbs. Definetly recommend it for your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Yudi & LaMarr

customer_reviews.title: Be careful with the screws and connectors they break easy.
customer_reviews.text: Parts were cheaply made. I broke two cam connectors by hardly twisting them because they are made of a cheap material. Instructions weren't the best. After all of that the art on the product looks great and my kid loves it. I do wish the screws had covers though.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzy Guffy

customer_reviews.title: Love the desk.
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased as a Christmas gift for my great grandchild. She seems to love it. The colors are very bright and the seat is large enough for her to keep a while. I love the bottom bin. It stores books, paper, and art supplies. It is a good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon D Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my son. I wanted him to have Elmo (whom he loves) and a place to sit and eat/play. He enjoys climbing in and out of this desk. It is sturdy and was not difficult to put together. We love it. He will just sit in the desk and count the numbers (hes almost 2 years old). It's definitely a seat he will grow into.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Bought the chair/desk for my grandson for Christmas. He loves it. It was by far his favorite present. And unlike the other presents that he got, he's still very interested in this one. This is his seat, no musical chairs for him anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Poor design
customer_reviews.text: Not an easy chair for my 14 month old to get in and out of because of the table. Poor design, also the screws that come with it to assemble don’t hold up well. Wish I could have returned it
customer_reviews.author: M.HEADDRUMZ

customer_reviews.title: Just o.k.
customer_reviews.text: This was difficult to assemble, but is of good quality. Some of the screw holes were already stripped and difficult to maintain when we got it and put it together for my granddaughter. We had to use wood glue to make sure it stayed together
customer_reviews.author: tanya papagiannakis

customer_reviews.title: I recommend putting little rubber stoppers on the bottom because it ...
customer_reviews.text: My 18 month old loves it. He can sit in it and feed himself and have the freedom to move around. I recommend putting little rubber stoppers on the bottom because it does slide around on carpet or wood.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Elmo chair for my toddler
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his chair, he climbs on it all the time and it’s a good height for easy accessibility. Took 1 star off as the seat board cracked when my husband put the screws in. I have to now duct tape it to cover all the edges. I wish the seat board wasn’t made of cheap ply wood for more durability.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I want one for adults!
customer_reviews.text: Great little desk for kids. I love it. Assembly is very much like an Ikea item, but much more colorful and fun. I'd love to have one at my office! Ha!
customer_reviews.author: Willie V. HughesTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, good product.
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and easy to assemable however it cracked when we screwed it together somehow... It's not as sturdy as we thought but it's still cute and worth the $28 or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute desk...photo doesn’t do it justice
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our granddaughter for Christmas. She absolutely loves it! Her mom says she draws/colors, puts her puzzles together, and eats her snack at it every day. It was easy to assemble, very sturdy and has an easy to clean surface. Would definitely purchase this item again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy customer
customer_reviews.text: This item is made out of particle board n breaks easily while putting it together. Also some of the holes do not match up so you can't screw it in. Really frustrating. I spent an hour out of my life doing this and couldn't finish bc the holes weren't matching up. The directiona were of no use. I used the picture on the box to put it together. Really annoying. You spend money on something and get a cheap product.
customer_reviews.author: samantha montanez

customer_reviews.title: Kids Love This Item
customer_reviews.text: Have given this as a shower present for future scholars and holiday present for our granddaughter. Kids love to pull up on this as young toddlers and then color, paint, eat snack or lunch. Safe, durable and easy to construct. This has been a great gift, able to use from 6 months to 5 years and beyond.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Let your baby sit/feel like a big boy/girl with this table/chair unit.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a great buy....My child loves this chair. No need for his high chair anymore. He can sit with and eat like a big boy now. This chair was incredibly easy to put together with the easy to read instructions. I love this chare and so does my son.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Love this desk!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my almost 2 year old for Christmas. It is absolutely precious & he LOVES it! It cleans easily & my husband put it together in no time. We’re debating buying one for our oldest child. We love this desk!
customer_reviews.author: EC3U

customer_reviews.title: My 2 year old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old got this for Christmas and he LOVES it! The size is perfect. It is a lot more sturdy than I thought. Even when my 2 year old sat on the desk part or climbed on it, it has survived that. It's easy to wipe clean so that's definitely a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Superb chair desk table for my Child
customer_reviews.text: Superb chair desk table. My daughter is about 3 years old and I bought it for her, she really loves sitting on it. Stylish cup holder, fabric bin, comfortable to sit, perfect for art craft, and easy to adjust this table is fabulous. I highly recommend you to buy it for your child.
customer_reviews.author: LaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLaLa

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I got this fir my 18 month old as we are starting to homeschool. He loves it, and it helps to keep his attention when working on lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Great kids desk
customer_reviews.text: My daughter absolutely loves this desk. She eats at it and plays on it with her toys while she watches her sesame street on tv. Great quality, very durable and easy to assemble. It is very heavy wood so it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: mrsmurphye

customer_reviews.title: STURDY AND GREAT MATERIAL FOR THE PRICE!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this desk, so does my toddler and husband who assembled it. He assembled it within 10 minutes using a power tool (that's what he has, not bc its needed). Its very sturdy, seems durable. I like the painted finish. My 23 month old was so excited and loves eating on it and sitting in it. This has definitely helped to encourage him to sit and eat, whereas before he was just standing or moving around bc he refused to sit at the table, booster or high chair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Build
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter loves her new desk. Built well and appears will last long enough for her little sister to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: B from LA

customer_reviews.title: Cute, sturdy except for storage
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter for her 2nd birthday as she was obsessed with Elmo. It’s cute and she liked it. I was glad to have the storage, but have found that over time the canvas on the drawer sags and doesn’t hold it’s shape. I also wish there was a option to assemble it for a left-handed kid, or buy a leftie version!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for young toddlers
customer_reviews.text: It’s super cute and easy to assemble. I was able to put it together myself which is nice and I’m no handy man. The only thing is the front corner of the leg is cracked from shipment but you can’t really tell unless you are staring at it for a while. My son loves it, he is learning how to get in and out of it. The tray is nice and big so he can eat a snack or color comfortably.
customer_reviews.author: Katlyn Collins

customer_reviews.title: Cute buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! It took me about 45 minutes to put together which wasnt terrible. Seems sturdy. The basket underneath for storage is flimsy but works.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsey

customer_reviews.title: Too cute! Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great buy and worth the money! I bought this for my 4 year old nephew and 2 year old niece and they both love it. Very good quality, seems like it will last them a long time
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Tray poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5 year old son with down syndrome. Product was easy to put together, but the tray is poorly designed. It broke off the 1st time we moved it! My son is devestated. We did add extra screws to try to fix it for him, but now the tray is not a smooth surface, so when he tries to color his pages rip.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica vogel

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend buying!
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time assembling but eventually got it. The chair itself is very durable and the colors are even more vibrant in person. My daughter loves reading, eating, and watching tv in her new chair!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Love it, needs a better bin.
customer_reviews.text: My toddler LOVES this. Exactly as pictured. Set up was mostly painless and it is durable. The only complaint I have is the bin needs to be more solid, for a kids desk the cardboard is just a joke and it is nearly destroyed already from being a footrest.
customer_reviews.author: RCG2016

customer_reviews.title: Good product would recommend but..
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good product assembled pretty easily, only thing that I will say that has me concerned is the actual desk writing surface seems a bit flimsy the way it was designed, can totally see this thing snapping in half, but I guess time will tell. Other than that concern I would recommend the product, just be wary of weight on the free side of the writing surface.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Green

customer_reviews.title: Great price for multi tasks
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is 3 yrs old & a big boy for his size, so we use it for breakfast , lunch & dinner!! He loves it!! Plus we set a side a hour for preschool a day & he loves to learn, the desk is perfect for that & food !!
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised at how well made this chair is
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice little chair, solid and sturdy, and my nephew loved it, especially the hidden drawer underneath the seat where he could stash his treasures.
customer_reviews.author: Inger

customer_reviews.title: Cute desk, good quality
customer_reviews.text: It took my 10 yr old son and I about 30-45 min to put together. Some parts of instructions are confusing so may take a little time to figure out as it’s an oddly shaped desk. Came with all parts needed. You’ll need a Phillips head screwdriver. Very cute and seems durable once assembled.
customer_reviews.author: Atlmomof3

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my granddaughter for Christmas. She loves the desk. She watches videos on her tablet, eats, watches tv, colors her coloring sheets...everything while sitting in her desk.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mayben

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetic....
customer_reviews.text: This looks pretty and my granddaughter loves it. She eats, plays and almost wants to sleep in it.
customer_reviews.author: Bewaji

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Might have to get s cushion for it. It was easy to put together took me like 35mins. Super cute. My son is tall for 3yr but he fits nicely.
customer_reviews.author: KRYS

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: My 20 month old daughter loves her desk! It was very easy to put together and we use the bottom drawer for puzzles and coloring books. After my husband gets her home from daycare, he sits her at her desk and she gets a little snack and a drink while she watches Disney Jr. It's so cute. It's like her own little snack table. When we have guests for dinner, we sometimes even use it for her to sit and have dinner to make more room for the adults at the table. I saw there are other accessories that match it, like a bookcase. I may have to order that too!
customer_reviews.author: JMOM

customer_reviews.title: It’s very sturdy and does the job
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one for character/colorful furniture but bought this for my 14 month old to sit and have snacks/color. It’s very sturdy and does the job. She likes that she can get in and out on her own vs. being buckled into the high chair.
customer_reviews.author: E. D.

customer_reviews.title: Quality and assembly concerns
customer_reviews.text: The instructions had letters identified for each part, but the letters were not on the parts so it made it a little challenging to assemble it. One if the edges was separated, so I had to use Gorilla glue and clamps to seal the edge Once this was done, it is good product for my grandson. I am concerned about how long it was last as I think the wood pueces are made out of particle board
customer_reviews.author: Jyaah

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super adorable much bigger than anticipated but that's ok it will last for a long time! Sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Hanna

customer_reviews.title: Missing Hardware
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two chair desks and recieved one chair with missing hardware. I was unable to assemble it. It was disappointing. My nephew was so excited to see that his chair was delivered. Now I have pieces furniture sitting in my livingroom. I know this is nothing compared to the craziness and tragedies currently happening around us. However, this small anticipation was a big deal to us.
customer_reviews.author: fareley

customer_reviews.title: This is worth buying!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy..good size. My granddaughter loves this seat. She can color..look at books.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture me and my little cousin put it together he’s 11 so, assemble was very easy; the desk is very sturdy.. so nice, I’m very happy 😃 with this product especially for the price !
customer_reviews.author: Sakinah M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little desk!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my one year old nephew. He loves it! Sits and watches tv, eats, colors..it is a perfect little chair for younger ones! Love that it has a storage basket underneath it, can use for books, crayons, toys..etc.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Cute but has some issues...
customer_reviews.text: Colors are bright and vibrant!!! Semi-easy to assemble. A modification in the table top (by the manufacturer) would make it easier for a toddler to sit down. My grandson Crosby, 3 years old in March, has struggled some getting in and out of the chair since he first sat in it almost two years ago. Chair design could also include a board of some sort on the back bottom to prevent the fabric drawer from being pushed out the back. It was worth the price, but could definitely use some design revisions.
customer_reviews.author: GayleC.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little desk
customer_reviews.text: My 19 month old grandson loves Cookie and Elmo. He sits at the little desk every moment he gets and points out and says the numbers
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I love that there was an instructional video online for assembly! This came together very quickly!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Savage

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Desk!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my grandson to have at my house. It was better than I ever expected. I read the reviews prior to purchasing and they were very true and helpful. I expected to have a little difficulty with putting it together and I did. You just have to be PATIENT and read every DETAIL of the instructions. Take your time and you will do fine (although a little time consuming), it's worth it! It's sturdy and very stable and heavy enough to not turn over. We continue to get compliments on it.
customer_reviews.author: Nioji

product_meta.title: Delta Children Chair Desk With Storage Bin, Sesame Street
product_meta.description:
Style:Character| Color:Sesame StreetAdd an extra element of fun to any room with this Sesame Street Chair Desk with Storage Bin from Delta Children! Boasting colorful graphics of Elmo and the rest of the Sesame Street gang, it features a removable cup holder for art supplies, and a storage bin underneath—keeping toys or books close at hand. Large surface area for studying or coloring. Assembled Dimensions (in inches): 18.00 (width) by 23.00 (height) by 22.75 (depth).

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
A perfect place to color, play, or study! The Sesame Street Chair with under the seat storage gives your toddler his or her place to learn and grow. The desk chair features an adorable design theme and makes a great gift idea. Some assembly required.
feature_bullets: Recommended for ages 3 to 6 years Holds up to 50 pounds
Made of engineered wood and fabric; Sits low to the ground for easy access
Features removable cup holder for art supplies and fabric storage bin; Wipe clean with a dry cloth
Scratch resistant finish protects the colorful graphics Assembled dimensions: 20.47 L x 22.83 W x 23.23 H Inches
Meets or exceeds all safety standards set by the CPSC

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,424 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
